original_title: 2008 Philadelphia Phillies: The Official World Series Film
overview: The Philadelphia Phillies are World Series champions! Major League Baseball Productions and Shout Factory! present the Official 2008 World Series Film. All the drama, game action, behind-the-scenes access and in-depth interviews a Phillies fan could want. The Official 2008 World Series Film will feature an adrenaline-filled feature-length film, highlights from the entire postseason and incisive bonus features.
title: 2008 Philadelphia Phillies: The Official World Series Film
